alert.note: Alert for Beaufort; Mainland Hyde; Tyrrell; Washington (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 5:23PM EDT by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Washington, northwestern Hyde, northeastern Beaufort and southwestern Tyrrell Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 523 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Terra Ceia, or 14 miles northeast of River Road, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Belhaven, Pinetown, Killkenny, Ponzer, Kilkenny, Pungo, Woodley, Pike Road, Leechville, Wenona, Terra Ceia, Yeatesville, Phelps Lake, Pungo Lake, Alligator Lake, Long Acre VFD, Creswell and Pantego. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
